: : Kup : :
Kup jumped to his feet, leading the young transformers. He took Cam and Elita to the center of the base, which he thought would be the safest place. It was the war room.
Kup: Cam, I need you to follow orders here. I know your young, but your now a member of this group, a soldier in war. I need you to just keep that baby, and yourself safe. Those are your orders. Understood?
Kup got his plasma rifle from subspace and began to look over it. He made sure it was fully loaded before cocking it.
Kup: I may have to leave to fight.
Kup then activates a computer terminal.
Kup: Computer, activate autodefences. Shields to full, and all autoguns online. I want the autoguns to fire their most destructive blasts. Seal off the ship and only allow authorized entrence. Authorization code: Security Chief Kup, code 58262005 epsilon! Red alert!
The computer acknolwleges the commands in beeps. The ships loghting went to a dark red as alarms sounded. The base sealed off. The shields became so strong that they could be seen even when weapons wern't striking them. Every autogun the ship had came out and began to fire on the Predacons. Every shot was like a small explosive.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Camoflage::
She sighed and follwed Kup. "At least it stopped crying. I just hope 
I didn't hurt it any. I tried to feed it and make it feel better. But 
I don't know anything about babies."

Battera::
She nodded to Windlord. "I understand. Please, I am still functional. 
You will get me if you are in need of help." With that, she made her 
way to the CR chamber. Once there in the chamber room, she climbed in 
and let the maintenance bots help heal her wounds.

KitKat::
She growled, hopped, jumped, leaped, ducked, rolled and twisted out 
of the way of Windlords shots. She sneered and fired her own 25shotws 
back at them. She looked t Desctructor,"I think we should find cover 
soon. Or else we will start to look like swiss energon." She looked 
at Rodimus, "Can we get around to thier soft spot and attack from 
another location that might do more damage?"



-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord/Elita:
> 
> Elita saw Cam cry and licked her as if she tried to confort her, 
then 
> Windlrd took the baby in arms and rock her. Elita started to calm 
> down and fall sleep.
> 
> "She likes you, Cam" said kindly Windlord "She just is a little 
> annoyed 'cause she likes sleep."
> 
> When Winlord was ready to speak the shots fell close them "By all 
> hawks... Predacons are visiting us,... Kup, Take the childrens and 
> care them... Cam, stay with Kup and care the baby... Owl hawk left 
> Aeroatuor in CR and reach me... I'll need a hand... Battera, take a 
> rest in CRs...   "
> 
> Windlor gave elita to Kup and ran towards Destructor and Kitkat.
> 
> "SHIELDS UP!!!!!" screamed the male.
> 
> after that the shields araised and Windlord shot 10 shots against 
> Destructor and 15 against Kitkat
> 
> 
>

<P><STRONG>: : Kup : :</STRONG>
<P>Kup jumped to his feet, leading the young transformers. He took Cam and Elita to the center of the base, which he thought would be the safest place. It was the war room.
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Cam, I need you to follow orders here. I know your young, but your now a member of this group, a soldier in war. I need you to just keep that baby, and yourself safe. Those are your orders. Understood?
<P>Kup got his plasma rifle from subspace and began to look over it. He made sure it was fully loaded before cocking it.
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>I may have to leave to fight.
<P>Kup then activates a computer terminal.
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Computer, activate autodefences. Shields to full, and all autoguns online. I want the autoguns to fire their most destructive blasts. Seal off the ship and only allow authorized entrence. Authorization code: Security Chief Kup, code 58262005 epsilon! Red alert!
<P>The computer acknolwleges the commands in beeps. The ships loghting went to a dark red as alarms sounded. The base sealed off. The shields became so strong that they could be seen even when weapons wern't striking them. Every autogun the ship had came out and began to fire on the Predacons. Every shot was like a small explosive.
